duties_responsibilities.duty: Inspect vials for defects and ensure compliance with standard operating procedures.
Prepare and maintain process-specific equipment for use in assigned areas.
Assist in writing and implementing process documents for the area.
Operate equipment according to standard operating procedures and cGMP requirements.
Perform label and packaging activities for finished product and review associated production records.
Train new inspectors in accordance with vial inspector certification procedures.
Assist other manufacturing functions as required.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or equivalent, 1 year of manufacturing or equivalent experience
